description_text:
Hi. I see you can ship the pedals in Netherlands. There are some import fee
to pay? The order will be above 150 euro.

conversations.body_text: Hi diego ferrigno,  If the item is in stock at our German warehouse, we will ship it from Germany first, and no customs duties apply within the EU. If the shipment is sent from China, it may be subject to customs inspection, in which case import duties may be charged.Â
